panels.description:
Service Time Per Second, show service time distribution among different SQL types:
1. Database time, the total time that the TiDB cluster is processing application requests.
2. The service time of different SQL types.
panels.title: Database Time by SQL Type

panels.description:
Service Time Per Second, show service time distribution among different SQL phases.
1. Database time, the total time that the TiDB cluster is processing application requests.
2. The service time of different SQL phases.
panels.title: Database Time by SQL Phase

panels.description:
Service Time Per Second, show service time distribution among different KV/PD request:
1. Execute time, the execute time in SQL Phase
2. Service time  of different KV/PD request
panels.title: SQL Execute Time Overview

panels.description:
TiDB statement statistics.
Bold red line on right Y axis for Failed Queries per second
panels.title: QPS

panels.description: TiDB command total statistics including both successful and failed ones
panels.title: CPS By Type

panels.description: TiDB plan cache hit total.
panels.title: Queries Using Plan Cache OPS

panels.description: kv/tso request total by command type
panels.title: KV/TSO Request OPS

panels.description: kv request time by  command source
panels.title: KV Request Time By Source

panels.description:
- avg: average cpu usage for all instance.
- delta: max(cpu utilization) - min(cpu utilization)
- max: max(cpu utilization)
panels.title: TiDB CPU

panels.description:
1. CPU: CPU utilization for all TiKV instances.
- CPU-Avg: avg(cpu utilization)
- CPU-Delta: max(cpu utilization) - min(cpu utilization)
- CPU-Max: max(cpu utilization)
2. IO MBps: The total bytes of read and write in all TiKV instances
panels.title: TiKV CPU/IO MBps

panels.description: TiDB query durations
panels.title: Duration

panels.description: TiDB connection idle durations
panels.title: Connection Idle Duration

panels.description: TiDB current connection counts
panels.title: Connection Count

panels.description: The time cost of parsing SQL to AST
panels.title: Parse Duration

panels.description: The time to build plan
panels.title: Compile Duration

panels.description: The time cost of executing the SQL which does not include the time to get the results of the query .
panels.title: Execute Duration

panels.description: tidb avg kv request duration
panels.title: Avg TiDB KV Request Duration

panels.description: tikv grpc avg duration
panels.title: Avg TiKV GRPC Duration

panels.description:
- TSO Wait Duration: The duration of a client starting to wait for the TS until received the TS result.
- TSO RPC Duration: The duration of a client sending TSO request until received the response.
- PD Server Handle Time: The time consumed by handling TiDB requests.
panels.title: PD TSO Wait/RPC Duration

panels.description:
The time consumed by processing asynchronous write requests.
Storage async write duration = store duration + apply duration
panels.title: Storage Async Write Duration

panels.description: The store time duration of each request
panels.title: Store Duration

panels.description: The apply time duration of each request
panels.title: Apply Duration

panels.description: The time consumed when Raft appends log
panels.title: Append Log Duration

panels.description: The time consumed when Raft commits log
panels.title: Commit Log Duration

panels.description: The time consumed for Raft to apply logs
panels.title: Apply Log Duration

panels.description: The CPU usage of each TiFlash instance
panels.title: CPU

panels.description: The memory usage per TiFlash instance
panels.title: Memory

panels.description: The I/O utilization per TiFlash instance
panels.title: IO utilization

panels.description: The MPP query count in TiFlash
panels.title: MPP Query count

panels.description: The number of coprocessor requests received by all TiFlash instances. batch is the number of batch requests. batch_cop is the number of coprocessor requests in the batch requests. cop is the number of coprocessor requests that are sent directly via the coprocessor interface. cop_dag is the number of dag requests in all coprocessor requests. super_batch is the number of requests to enable the Super Batch feature.
panels.title: Request QPS

panels.description: The number of each type of dag executors in the requests received by all TiFlash instances. table_scan is the table scan executor. selection is the selection executor. aggregation is the aggregation executor. top_n is the TopN executor. limit is the limit executor.
panels.title: Executor QPS

panels.description: The overview of  the total duration of all TiFlash instances processing coprocessor requests.
panels.title: Request Duration Overview

panels.description: The total duration of all TiFlash instances processing coprocessor requests.
panels.title: Request Duration

panels.description: The duration of all TiFlash instances processing coprocessor requests. The processing time is from starting to execute the coprocessor request to completing the execution.
panels.title: Request Handle Duration

panels.description: The time used by wait_index for all TiFlash instances, namely the time used to wait until local index >= read_index after the read_index request is received.
panels.title: Raft Wait Index Duration

panels.description: The number of times that each TiFlash instance triggers the read_index request per second, which equals to the number of Regions triggered.
panels.title: Raft Batch Read Index Duration

panels.description: The throughput of write by instance
panels.title: Write Throughput By Instance

panels.description: The flow of different kinds of write operations
panels.title: Write flow

panels.description: The flow of different kinds of read operations
panels.title: Read flow

panels.description: CPU usage of TiCDC
panels.title: CPU usage

panels.description: Memory usage of TiCDC
panels.title: Memory usage

panels.description: Goroutine count of TiCDC
panels.title: Goroutine count

panels.description: The lag between changefeed checkpoint ts and the latest ts of upstream TiDB.
panels.title: Changefeed checkpoint lag

panels.description: The lag between changefeed resolved ts and the latest ts of upstream TiDB.
panels.title: Changefeed resolved ts lag

panels.description:
The status of each changefeed.

0: Normal

1: Error

2: Failed

3: Stopped

4: Finished

-1: Unknown
panels.title: The status of changefeeds

panels.description:
The number of events that puller outputs to sorter 
 per second

targets.expr: sum (rate(ticdc_puller_txn_collect_event_count{k8s_cluster="$k8s_cluster", tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", type!="resolved"}[1m])) by (changefeed, instance, type)

panels.title: Puller output events/s

panels.description:
The number of events that sorter outputs to puller 
 per second
panels.title: Sorter output events/s

panels.description: The number of events that mounter outputs to sink per second
panels.title: Mounter output events/s

panels.description: The number of events that table sorter outputs to sink per second
panels.title: Table sink output events/s

panels.description: The number of rows that sink flushes to downstream per second.
panels.title: SinkV2 - Sink flush rows/s

panels.description: Full flush (backend flush + callback + conflict detector notify) duration
panels.title: Transaction Sink Full Flush Duration

panels.description: MQ worker send messages to Kafka, this metric record the time cost on send every message.
panels.title: MQ Worker Send Message Duration Percentile

panels.description:
Bytes/second written off all brokers.
value = one-minute moving average rate of Bytes per second
panels.title: Kafka Outgoing Bytes
